reader - Variable in class Parser
 
removeCharacter(Character) - Method in class Room
Removes a character object from the room.
removeEvent() - Method in class Room
Removes the event from the room by setting its value to null.
removeItem(Item) - Method in class Room
Removes an Item object from the room.
removeItemToGive() - Method in class Character
Removes any item the character has to give you by setting the item's value to null.
removeKey() - Method in class Room
Removes the key from the room by setting its value to null.
removeLockedExit(String, Room) - Method in class Room
Removes a locked exit from a room, and turns it into a normal exit that isn't locked.
retryGame() - Method in class Game
Presents the player with the option to retry the game, and thus start it again once they've died and failed.
